snippet: Two high-ranking officers previously convicted in the massacre were found not guilty by the International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda.
abstract: International Criminal Tribune for Rwanda acquits, on appeal, Augustin Ndindiliyimana and Francois-Xavier Nzuwonemeye, former high-ranking Rwandan officers convicted in taking part in country's 1994 genocide.
lead_paragraph: Two high-ranking officers previously convicted in the massacre were found not guilty by the International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda.

headline.main: U.N. Court, on Appeal, Acquits 2 Rwandans in 1994 Genocide
headline.print_headline: U.N. Court Acquits on Appeal 2 Rwandans in ’94 Genocide

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
